turns.text: Hi One of the interesting things that I have considered about the role change for women is that women of my age my generation were trained and taught and brought up to be the LEAVE IT TO BEAVER housewives
turns.label: fp

turns.text: But we are not living in that world
turns.label: sv

turns.text: We are certainly not our families have changed
turns.label: aa

turns.text: uh-huh Thats one of the - and it makes you really concerned I am glad I raised guys
turns.label: b

turns.text: You know let the world train them what to do But characteristically you know the women are trained or have been in the past trained in the home
turns.label: ad

turns.text: And I really would be at loss to to raise and train girl I think I would
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah its - well even even raising boys today is different though because
turns.label: b

turns.text: they are expected to do so much more than they used to
You know used to be they would just go off to work and come home and you know everything was done And it its different world Its
turns.label: sd

turns.text: its nice that theres choice I I have chosen to stay at home
turns.label: sv

turns.text: And I have ten year old and twelve year old
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And I was single parent for awhile and worked
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And that was great I was able to and I was able to provide for my children and and you know
turns.label: sv

turns.text: But I I thank God everyday now that I have that choice
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And that I am able to do things at home and and uh I volunteer whole lot
And uh thats my job right now
turns.label: sd

turns.text: I did very much the same thing until my boys got into high school and said Mom please do not be involved
turns.label: sd(^q)

turns.text: Then I went back to work
turns.label: sd

turns.text: I know that day will come
turns.label: sd

turns.text: and I am looking forward to that too
turns.label: sd

turns.text: But thats different phase in my life
turns.label: sd

turns.text: and I am I am glad that I am able to do what I want to do right now
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Well you know theres lot of things that have happened actually and and its its like the its like oil on top of water it changes but its never different --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Uh women at one time did very heavy physical labor --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and were expected to maintain household
Then as times changed uh as it is today we do not do lot of physical labor
turns.label: sv

turns.text: even in hous- even in housekeeping
theres not lot of physical labor
turns.label: sv

turns.text: doing laundry by hand and that kind of thing
And in that respect we have to make ourselves become involved in physical exertion
turns.label: sv

turns.text: or we really do develop some health problems
turns.label: sv

turns.text: So in in that in that respect I am not so sure that the hard work of years past was not better for us than we are willing to admit
turns.label: sd

turns.text: But dont you think its that way with men too I mean you know men are sitting behind desks whole lot more
turns.label: qy

turns.text: in general but specifically the womans role
in society has changed And you know medical reports tell us that women are developing diseases now that used to be predominately male diseases
Heart disease was characteristic of men
turns.label: sd

turns.text: now theres almost equally predominant in women
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And stress disorders and things like that
turns.label: bf

turns.text: Right and I think that thats thats symptom of our society its symptom that theres theres general illness that needs to be healed
turns.label: b

turns.text: I do not know what the healing process would be or what was causing the problem I am not I am not God
turns.label: sd

turns.text: But I I do know that in raising my boys I really did meet lot of pressures saying you know you need to get them into music lessons you need to get them
turns.label: sd(^q)

turns.text: into sports you need to get them into this they need to be busy and they need to be active And I fought all of those things I said if those boys want to be involved in that they will come to me and they will say Mom this is important to me I want to do it
otherwise I will guard their ability to have quiet time
turns.label: sd

turns.text: I refused to cram their lives full
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah yeah Its funny its funny I was rea-
turns.label: b

turns.text: And thats the way it is with woman too
turns.label: sv

turns.text: I was really looking forward to summer thinking oh we are going to have some time off
And its been real busy And actually today is really the first as far as I am concerned the first day of summer
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Because we have had so much going on the past few weeks
uh well thats how society has changed uh
turns.label: sv

turns.text: you know uh the family has changed we you know we find ourselves doing things that we never did as kids
You know I do not remember
turns.label: sd

turns.text: being involved in things like this
its just - I do not know only time will tell whether its better or worse
turns.label: sv

turns.text: than the way we grew up But uh
Well I just am very much believer in quiet personal time If you do not have the time to talk to yourself who are you going to talk to Right
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And I guarded my childrens rights for that and I think that thats one of the things that women are sacrificing that they should not do
turns.label: sd

turns.text: They are sacrificing their time with themselves Theres nothing wrong with sitting and being bored if you thinking internally
turns.label: sv

turns.text: You are finding out who you are
turns.label: sv

turns.text: But is not that difficult to do when you are working full time and have to come home and prepare meal and
turns.label: qh

turns.text: get homework done and you know where do you find the time
Um Well in the first place its not your homework its your childrens homework
turns.label: sv

turns.text: And I was always very careful to be there only when they came to me and asked me for help
turns.label: sd

turns.text: I helped them with exactly what they asked for and thats all
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Thats part of the problem that women have always had and that is accepting responsibility for things that really are other peoples responsibilities
turns.label: sv

turns.text: And then that way we have not changed in
turns.label: qy^g

turns.text: They do not know how to think for themselves and be responsible
turns.label: sv

turns.text: for themselves I do not know why God made women brilliant I -
Yes but I do not know they tend to look at the mother as the one who solves all problems They
turns.label: aa

turns.text: are all things to all people and thats never changed

Thats thats very true I as matter of fact I was talking to friend yesterday who said she has new policy in her home and when her her family comes to her and says fix this you know I am having problem with
turns.label: aa

turns.text: you know another member of the family
she said I have taken new stance and I say no I will not
turns.label: sd(^q)

turns.text: You know you work it out for yourself
turns.label: ^q

turns.text: And she said its amazing she said
turns.label: sd(^q)

turns.text: you know every single person in this family expects me to get - and they dra- suck me into these arguments and
these conversations and I ha- I am supposed to be the one who is going to fix it all and and soothe everybody And she said I am not doing it anymore I I just -
You know I think thats one of the things that we have today that is very useful and I think every woman ought to deal with it or ought to at least be exposed to it and that is mediation training
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Uh we are not talking about strikes or things we are talking about mediators who get involved in family crises
turns.label: sd

turns.text: parents and children husbands and wives
uh you know boss and employee Those kinds of things Interpersonal mediation
because the mediator is an unbiased bystander who -
